description.brazilian: Fuja da cela no forte.
description.dutch: Ontsnapte uit de cel in de donjon.
description.english: Escaped the cell in the keep.
description.french: T'échappe des lutins qui t'a kidnappé.
description.german: Brich aus der Zelle in der Burg aus.
description.greek: Απέδρασες από το κελί στο κάστρο.
description.italian: Sei scappato dalla cella nella fortezza.
description.polish: Udało Ci się uciec z celi w warowni.
description.portuguese: Escapaste da cela na fortaleza.
description.spanish: Has escapado de tu celda en la torre

description.brazilian: Encontre Railan e aceite-o em seu grupo.
description.dutch: Rider ontmoet en hij sloot zich bij de partij aan.
description.english: Met Rider and he joined your party.
description.french: Convaincs le Cavalier à te joindre.
description.greek: Συνάντησες τον καβαλάρη και αυτός προσχώρησε στην ομάδα σου.
description.italian: Hai incontrato Rider e si è unito al tuo party.
description.polish: Spotkałeś Jeźdźca, który dołączył do twojej drużyny.
description.portuguese: Conheceste o Rider e ele juntou-se ao teu grupo.
description.russian: Встретили Райдера, и он присоединился к вашей команде.
description.spanish: Has conocido a RIder y se ha unido a tu equipo

description.brazilian: Derrote o monstro aquático no fim da caverna.
description.dutch: Versla het watermonster aan het einde van de grot.
description.english: Beat the water monster at the end of the cave.
description.german: Das Wassermonster am Ende der Höhle besiegt.
description.greek: Νίκησες το τέρας του νερού στο τέλος της σπηλιάς.
description.italian: Hai battuto il mostro acquatico alla fine della grotta.
description.polish: Pokonałeś potwora wodnego na końcu jaskini.
description.portuguese: Derrotaste o monstro aquático no fim da caverna.
description.russian: Одолели водяное чудище в конце пещеры.
description.spanish: Has derrotado al monstruo de agua al final de la cueva

description.brazilian: Troque algo pela insígnia.
description.dutch: Geruild voor de speld.
description.english: Traded for the badge.
description.greek: Διαπραγματεύτηκες για το έμβλημα.
description.italian: Hai ricevuto l'emblema barattando.
description.portuguese: Trocaste um item pelo distintivo.
description.spanish: Has intercambiado por la medalla

description.brazilian: Encontre Rios e aceite-o em seu grupo.
description.dutch: Rios ontmoet en hij sloot zich bij de partij aan.
description.english: Met Rios and he joined your party.
description.greek: Συνάντησες τον Rios και αυτός προσχώρησε στην ομάδα σου.
description.italian: Hai incontrato Rios e si è unito al tuo party.
description.polish: Spotkałeś Riosa, który dołączył do twojej drużyny.
description.portuguese: Conheceste o Rios e ele juntou-se ao teu grupo.
description.russian: Встретили Райоса, и он присоединился к вашей команде.
description.spanish: Has conocido a Rios y se ha unido a tu equipo

description.brazilian: Encontre Gander e aceite-o em seu grupo.
description.dutch: Gunnar ontmoet en hij sloot zich bij de partij aan.
description.english: Met Gunnar and he joined your party.
description.greek: Συνάντησες τον Gunnar και αυτός προσχώρησε στην ομάδα σου.
description.italian: Hai incontrato Gunnar e si è unito al tuo party.
description.polish: Spotkałeś Gunnara, który dołączył do twojej drużyny.
description.portuguese: Conheceste o Gunnar e ele juntou-se ao teu grupo.
description.russian: Встретили Гуннара, и он присоединился к вашей команде.
description.spanish: Has conocido a Gunnar y se ha unido a tu equipo

description.brazilian: Troque algo pelo anel.
description.dutch: Geruild voor de ring.
description.english: Traded for the ring.
description.greek: Διαπραγματεύτηκες για το δαχτυλίδι.
description.italian: Hai ricevuto l'anello barattando.
description.portuguese: Trocaste um item pelo anel.
description.spanish: Has intercambiado por el anillo

description.brazilian: Derrote a bruxa na montanha.
description.dutch: De Heks verslagen op de berg.
description.english: Defeated the Witch on the mountain.
description.german: Die Hexe in den Bergen besiegt.
description.greek: Συνέτριψες τη μάγισσα στο βουνό.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto la Strega sulla montagna.
description.portuguese: Derrotaste a Bruxa na montanha.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a la Bruja en la montaña

description.brazilian: Derrote os golems que estão atacando Florana.
description.dutch: Versla de Golems die Flowey aanvallen.
description.english: Beat the Golems attacking Flowey.
description.french: Vaincs the Golems qui attaquent Flowey.
description.german: Die Golems, die Flowey angreifen, besiegt.
description.greek: Νίκησες τα Golems που επιτέθηκαν στο Flowey.
description.italian: Hai battuto i Golem che stavano attaccando Flowey
description.portuguese: Derrotaste os Golens que estavam a atacar Flowey.
description.spanish: Derrota a los Golems que atacan a Flowey

description.brazilian: Troque algo pela chave.
description.dutch: Geruild voor de sleutel.
description.english: Traded for the key.
description.greek: Διαπραγματεύτηκες για το κλειδί.
description.italian: Hai ricevuto la chiave barattando.
description.portuguese: Trocaste um item pela chave.
description.spanish: Has intercambiado por la llave

description.brazilian: Troque algo pelo medalhão.
description.dutch: Geruild voor het medaillon.
description.english: Traded for the medallion.
description.greek: Διαπραγματεύτηκες για το μενταγιόν.
description.italian: Hai ricevuto il medaglione barattando.
description.portuguese: Trocaste um item pelo medalhão.
description.spanish: Has intercambiado por el medallón

description.brazilian: Derrote os invasores na praia.
description.dutch: De indringers verslagen op het strand.
description.english: Defeated the invaders on the beach.
description.french: Gagne la bataille sur la plage.
description.greek: Συνέτριψες τους εισβολείς στην παραλία.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto gli invasori sulla spiaggia.
description.portuguese: Derrotaste os invasores na praia.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a los invasores en la playa

description.brazilian: Agrade o fazendeiro e ganhe o leite.
description.dutch: De boer tevreden gesteld om melk te krijgen.
description.english: Pleased the farmer to get milk.
description.greek: Παρακάλεσες τον αγρότη να σου δώσει γάλα.
description.italian: Hai soddisfatto l'agricoltore per ottenere il latte.
description.koreana: 우유를 얻기 위해 농부를 기쁘게 해 주었다.
description.polish: Byłeś miły dla rolnika i otrzymałeś mleko.
description.portuguese: Agradaste ao agricultor para obteres leite.
description.spanish: Has complacido a los granjeros para obtener leche

description.brazilian: Abra caminho pelo canal até a fortaleza.
description.dutch: Een pad door de trog geslagen om het fort te bereiken.
description.english: Blasted a path through the trench to reach the fortress.
description.german: Einen Weg durch den Graben gesprengt, um die Festung zu erreichen.
description.greek: Εκτοξεύοντας τορπίλες, δημιούργησες ένα μονοπάτι μέσω του χαρακώματος για να φτάσεις στο φρούριο.
description.italian: Ti sei fatto strada attraverso la trincea per raggiungere la fortezza.
description.koreana: 요새로 가기 위해 참호를 통과하는 길을 폭파했다.
description.polish: Przedarłeś się przez kanał i dopłynąłeś do fortecy.
description.portuguese: Abriste um caminho através da trincheira para alcançares a fortaleza.
description.russian: Проложили путь через впадину и достигли крепости.
description.spanish: Has creado un camino entre las trincheras para llegar a la fortaleza

description.brazilian: Use o medalhão e obtenha a luneta.
description.dutch: Het medaillon gebruikt om de kijker te verkrijgen.
description.english: Used the medallion to get the looking scope.
description.german: Das Medaillon benutzt, um das Fernrohr zu bekommen.
description.greek: Χρησιμοποίησες το μενταγιόν για να αποκτήσεις το οπτικό πεδίο.
description.italian: Hai utilizzato il medaglione per ottenere il cannocchiale.
description.portuguese: Utilizaste o medalhão para obteres o telescópio.
description.spanish: Has usado el medallón para obtener la mira telescópica

description.brazilian: Drene a água na fortaleza.
description.dutch: Het zwembad drooggelegd in het fort.
description.english: Drained the pool in the fortress.
description.french: Allume les quatre autels dans la forteresse flottante.
description.german: Den Pool in der Festung geleert
description.greek: Αποστράγγισες τη λίμνη μέσα στο φρούριο.
description.italian: Hai svuotato la pozza nella fortezza.
description.portuguese: Drenaste a piscina na fortaleza.
description.spanish: Has vaciado la fuente en la fortaleza

description.brazilian: Derrote o Titi malvado.
description.dutch: Versla kwaadaardige Tiggy in het gevecht.
description.english: Beat Evil Tiggy in battle.
description.french: Vaincs Tiggy pendant qu'il est possédé par le sceptre.
description.greek: Νίκησες στη μάχη τον σατανικό Tiggy.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Evil Tiggy in battaglia.
description.portuguese: Derrotaste o Tiggy Maléfico em combate.
description.spanish: Has derrotado al Malvado Tiggy en batalla

description.brazilian: Liberte o prisioneiro no forte.
description.dutch: De gevangene in de burcht bevrijd.
description.english: Freed the prisoner in the keep.
description.french: Libère le prissonier du château Ohleo.
description.german: Den Gefangenen in der Festung befreit.
description.greek: Απελευθέρωσες τον φυλακισμένο στο κάστρο.
description.italian: Hai liberato il prigioniero nella fortezza.
description.portuguese: Libertaste o prisioneiro na fortaleza.
description.spanish: Has liberado al prisionero en la torre

description.brazilian: Elimine a horda de goblins usando arco e flecha.
description.dutch: De horde goblins gedood met pijl en boog.
description.english: Killed the goblin horde with bow and arrow.
description.french: Complète le jeu de Tir  à L'arc.
description.german: Die Goblin-Horde mit Pfeil und Bogen besiegt.
description.greek: Σκότωσες την ορδή των καλικάντζαρων με τόξα και βέλη.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto l'orda di goblin con arco e frecce.
description.portuguese: Mataste a horda de goblins com um arco e flechas.
description.russian: Убили орду гоблинов луком и стрелами.
description.spanish: Has eliminado a la horda de goblins con arco y flecha

description.brazilian: Recupere o cajado no topo do forte.
description.dutch: De staf heroverd bovenaan de burcht.
description.english: Recovered the staff at the top of the keep.
description.german: Den Stab in der Festung gefunden.
description.greek: Ανέκτησες τη ράβδο στην κορυφή του κάστρου.
description.italian: Hai recuperato lo scettro nella parte superiore della fortezza.
description.portuguese: Recuperaste o bastão no topo da fortaleza.
description.spanish: Has recuperado el báculo en la cima de la torre

description.brazilian: Encontre um tesouro na floresta.
description.dutch: Een schat gevonden in het bos.
description.english: Found a treasure in the forest.
description.greek: Βρήκες έναν θησαυρό στο δάσος.
description.italian: Hai trovato un tesoro nella foresta.
description.portuguese: Encontraste um tesouro na floresta.
description.spanish: Has encontrado un tesoro en el bosque

description.brazilian: Encontre e destrua a árvore possuída na selva.
description.dutch: De bezeten boom gevonden en gedood in de jungle.
description.english: Found and killed the possessed tree in the jungle.
description.french: Vaincs l'arbre possédé dans la forêt.
description.german: Den besessenen Baum im Dschungel gefunden und getötet.
description.greek: Βρήκες και σκότωσες το δαιμονισμένο δέντρο στη ζούγκλα.
description.italian: Hai trovato e sconfitto l'Albero Posseduto nella giungla.
description.koreana: 정글에서 귀신 들린 나무를 찾아 처치했다.
description.polish: W dżungli znalazłeś opętane drzewo i pokonałeś je.
description.portuguese: Encontraste e mataste a árvore possuída na selva.
description.russian: Нашли и убили одержимое дерево в джунглях.
description.spanish: Has encontrado y eliminado al árbol poseído en la jungla

description.brazilian: Mate a bruxa-dragão no topo do vulcão.
description.dutch: De Drakenheks gedood op de top van de vulkaan.
description.english: Killed the Dragon Witch at the top of the volcano.
description.german: Die Drachenhexe auf dem Vulkan getötet.
description.greek: Σκότωσες τη μάγισσα δράκο στην κορυφή του ηφαιστείου.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto la Strega Drago in cima al vulcano.
description.polish: Na szczycie wulkanu zabiłeś Smoczą Wiedźmę.
description.portuguese: Mataste a Bruxa-Dragão no topo do vulcão.
description.spanish: Has eliminado a la Bruja Dragón en la cima del volcán

description.brazilian: Viaje para outro mundo.
description.dutch: Gereisd naar een andere wereld.
description.english: Travelled to another world.
description.greek: Ταξίδεψες στον άλλο κόσμο.
description.italian: Hai viaggiato in un altro mondo.
description.portuguese: Viajaste para outro mundo.
description.spanish: Has viajado a otro mundo

description.brazilian: Encontre Pipo e aceite-o em seu grupo.
description.dutch: Tipper ontmoet en hij sloot zich bij de partij aan.
description.english: Met Tipper and he joined your party.
description.greek: Συνάντησες τον Tipper και αυτός προσχώρησε στην ομάδα σου.
description.italian: Hai incontrato Tipper e si è unito al tuo party.
description.polish: Spotkałeś Tippera, który dołączył do twojej drużyny.
description.portuguese: Conheceste o Dicas e ele juntou-se ao teu grupo.
description.russian: Встретили Типера, и он присоединился к вашей команде.
description.spanish: Has conocido a Tipper y se ha unido a tu equipo

description.brazilian: Troque algo pelo orbe de luz.
description.dutch: Geruild voor de bol van licht.
description.english: Traded for the light orb.
description.greek: Διαπραγματεύτηκες για τη σφαίρα φωτός.
description.italian: Hai ricevuto la sfera luminosa barattando.
description.portuguese: Trocaste um item pela esfera de luz.
description.spanish: Has intercambiado por el orbe de luz

description.brazilian: Obtenha o cajado com o rei Alberto.
description.dutch: Kreeg de staf van Koning Albert.
description.english: Got the staff from King Albert.
description.german: Den Stab von König Albert bekommen.
description.greek: Πήρες τη ράβδο από τον Βασιλιά Albert.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto lo scettro da Re Albert.
description.portuguese: Obteste o bastão do Rei Alberto.
description.spanish: Has recuperado el báculo del Rey Albert

description.brazilian: Derrote o último chefe.
description.dutch: Versla de eindbaas.
description.english: Beat the final boss.
description.greek: Νίκησες τον τελευταίο αρχηγό.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il boss finale.
description.portuguese: Derrotaste o monstro final.
description.spanish: Has derrotado al jefe final

description.brazilian: Destrua o cajado maligno.
description.dutch: Vernietigde de kwaadaardige staf.
description.english: Destroyed the evil staff.
description.greek: Κατέστρεψες την κακή ράβδο.
description.italian: Hai distrutto lo scettro malvagio.
description.portuguese: Destruíste o bastão maléfico.
description.spanish: Has destruido el báculo malvado

description.brazilian: Assista aos créditos no fim do jogo.
description.dutch: De aftiteling van het spel bekeken.
description.english: Watched the end-game credits.
description.greek: Παρακολούθησες τους πόντους στο τέλος του παιχνιδιού.
description.italian: Hai visto i titoli di coda del gioco.
description.polish: Obejrzałeś listę płac na końcu gry.
description.portuguese: Assististe à ficha técnica do fim do jogo.
description.spanish: Has visto los créditos al final del juego
